typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Client ID} as integer,
		{Dealer ID} as string,
		{Customer ID} as string,
		{New or Used} as string,
		{Vehicle Type} as string,
		{Vehicle ID} as string,
		{Stock Number} as string,
		{Registration Number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as date,
		{Dealership Date in Stock} as date,
		Mileage as integer,
		{Stock Value} as decimal(10,0),
		{Sale Date} as date,
		{Invoice Number} as string,
		{Sales Executive ID} as string,
		{Full Invoice Value} as decimal(10,0),
		{Paint Value} as decimal(10,0),
		{Warranty Value} as decimal(10,0),
		{GAP Value} as decimal(10,0),
		{Wheel Protection Value} as decimal(10,0),
		{Add on Product 1} as decimal(10,0),
		{Add on Product 2} as decimal(10,0),
		{Add on Product 3} as decimal(10,0),
		{Add on Product 4} as decimal(10,0),
		{Accessory Value} as decimal(10,0),
		Reconditioning as decimal(10,0),
		{Finance Commission} as decimal(10,0),
		Financed as string,
		{Total Gross Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{Sale Type} as string,
		{Part Exchange Stock Number 1} as string,
		{Part Exchange Stock Number 2} as string,
		{Part Exchange Stock Number 3} as string,
		Source as string,
		{Vehicle Category Code} as string,
		{Purchaser ID} as string,
		Supplier as string,
		{Available Date} as date,
		{Accessory Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{Paint Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{Warranty Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{GAP Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{Other Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{Add On Product 1 Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{Add On Product 2 Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{Add On Product 3 Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{Add On Product 4 Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{Volume Bonus} as decimal(10,0),
		{Other Bonus} as decimal(10,0),
		{RFL Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{Metal Profit} as decimal(10,0),
		{Metal Invoice Value} as decimal(10,0),
		{Delivery Date} as date,
		{Group Purchase Date} as date,
		{Received Date} as date,
		{Purchase Account} as string,
		{Sales Account ID} as string,
		{Sales Account Name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	dateFormats: ['dd/MM/yyyy'],
	wildcardPaths:['Client Folder/*/DetailedVehSales-*.csv']) ~> DetailedSales
DetailedSales sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ClientID as integer,
		{Dealer ID} as string,
		{Customer ID} as string,
		{New Or Used} as string,
		{Vehicle Type} as string,
		{DMS Vehicle ID} as string,
		{Stock Number} as string,
		{Registration Number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as date,
		{Dealership Date In Stock} as date,
		Mileage as integer,
		{Stock Value} as decimal(18,2),
		{Sale Date} as date,
		{Invoice Number} as integer,
		{Sales Executive ID} as string,
		{Full Invoice Value} as decimal(18,2),
		{Paint Value} as decimal(18,2),
		{Warranty Value} as decimal(18,2),
		{Gap Value} as decimal(18,2),
		{Wheel Protection Value} as decimal(18,2),
		{Add on Product 1} as decimal(18,2),
		{Add on Product 2} as decimal(18,2),
		{Add on Product 3} as decimal(18,2),
		{Add on Product 4} as decimal(18,2),
		{Volume Bonus} as decimal(18,2),
		{Other Bonus} as decimal(18,2),
		{RFL Profit} as decimal(18,2),
		{Metal Profit} as decimal(18,2),
		{Metal Invoice Value} as decimal(18,2),
		{Delivery Date} as date,
		{Group Purchase Date} as date,
		{Received Date} as date,
		{Purchase Account} as string,
		{Sales Account ID} as string,
		{Sales Account Name} as string,
		FileName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table dbo.DMSVehicleSales_Merge'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: false,
	mapColumn(
		ClientID = {Client ID},
		{Dealer ID},
		{Customer ID},
		{New Or Used} = {New or Used},
		{Vehicle Type},
		{DMS Vehicle ID} = {Vehicle ID},
		{Stock Number},
		{Registration Number},
		{Registration Date},
		{Dealership Date In Stock} = {Dealership Date in Stock},
		Mileage,
		{Stock Value},
		{Sale Date},
		{Invoice Number},
		{Sales Executive ID},
		{Full Invoice Value},
		{Paint Value},
		{Warranty Value},
		{Gap Value} = {GAP Value},
		{Wheel Protection Value},
		{Add on Product 1},
		{Add on Product 2},
		{Add on Product 3},
		{Add on Product 4},
		{Volume Bonus},
		{Other Bonus},
		{RFL Profit},
		{Metal Profit},
		{Metal Invoice Value},
		{Delivery Date},
		{Group Purchase Date},
		{Received Date},
		{Purchase Account},
		{Sales Account ID},
		{Sales Account Name},
		FileName
	)) ~> SQLDMSDetailedSalesMerge
